results.name: XOR BINOMIAL transform of A003188 (Gray code numbers); also the main diagonal of the XOR difference triangle A099891.
comment: See A099884 for the definitions of the XOR BINOMIAL transform and the XOR difference triangle.
Multiplicative with a(2^e) =3*2^(e-1), a(p^e) = 0 otherwise. - _David W. Wilson_, Jun 12 2005
formula: a(2^n) = 3*2^(n-1) for n>0, with a(0)=0, a(1) = 1 and a(k)=0 otherwise. a(n) = SumXOR_{i=0..n} (C(n, i)mod 2)*A003188(n-i), where A003188(k)=bitxor(k, [k/2]) and SumXOR is summation under XOR.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Oct 29 2004
